H0.text: who formed the american federation of labor. Eugene V. Debs

H1.text: who formed the american federation of labor. Mary Harris Jones

H2.text: who formed the american federation of labor. John Mitchell

H3.text: who formed the american federation of labor. Samuel Gompers

A4.text: The American Federation of Labor was founded in Columbus, Ohio, in 1886 by an alliance of craft unions eager to provide mutual support and disappointed in the Knights of Labor.

A5.text: Samuel Gompers was elected the full-time president at its founding convention and was re-elected every year except one until his death in 1924.
